root.message: The UNIT_MEASURE field for indicator 14-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Percent (%). The percentage of pixels in a country’s EEZ and/or territorial waters that are identified as deviating from the baseline (falling in the 90th percentile) will be calculated for each national EEZ and/or territorial waters by month.

Number. The total count of plastic items for all area sampled

kilograms of carbon (from algae biomass) per square kilometre of river basin area per day (kg C km-2 day-1). KG C KM2 per day
